channel.title: CVE Feed for BogdanFix -- WP SendFox

item.title: CVE-2024-49284|2024-10-17T17:22:23.844Z -- bogdanfix -- wp%20sendfox
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in BogdanFix WP SendFox allows Retrieve Embedded Sensitive Data.This issue affects WP SendFox: from n/a through 1.3.1.
